snippet: In a letter to the Treasury Department, the financial industry urged that the start-up costs of the new Office of Financial Research be paid for by the Federal Reserve instead of the banks it oversees.
abstract: In a letter to the Treasury Department, the financial industry urged that the start-up costs of the new Office of Financial Research be paid for by the Federal Reserve instead of the banks it oversees.

headline.main: Wall Street Says New Oversight Agency Is Too Costly
